@Version(value="1.10.1")

Package com.adobe.granite.security.user

Provides a framework for accessing users and their properties.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SSLConfigurationService
    The SSLConfigurationService allows verifying whether a valid SSL configuration is present.
    UserManagementService
    Service interface for common user management related tasks and utility methods.
    UserProperties
    UserProperties is a general interface used to represent user preferences and profiles.
    UserPropertiesComposite Deprecated
    UserPropertiesFilter
    The UserPropertiesFilter is used to determine whether a given UserProperties object is included or not.
    UserPropertiesManager
    The UserPropertiesManager interface provides access to UserProperties associated with a given authorizable.
    UserPropertiesQueryParams
    Groups together all the criteria and controls that can be used to configure the search for authorizables.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    UserPropertiesService
    UserPropertiesService...
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthorizableTypes
    Enumeration of combinations of authorizable types.

Package com.adobe.granite.security.user Description

Provides a framework for accessing users and their properties.
